projectGridLines.title: 1)  Leveraging LLMs to Create Next-Gen Skills Evaluation Framework 2) Leveraging AI to Create Byte-Sized Content from Educational Resources
projectGridLines.description:
Title: Leveraging LLMs to Create Next-Gen Skills Evaluation Framework


Description: This project involves designing and implementing a skills evaluation framework using large language models (LLMs). The objective is to create a system that can dynamically assess learnersâ€™ skills across various domains, provide personalized feedback, and identify gaps in understanding. The project will also involve integrating the framework into a scalable platform for real-world testing.


Skill sets: Natural Language Processing (NLP), Python (for working with LLMs like OpenAI GPT, Hugging Face models)


Traits expectation: Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, Creativity in designing AI-driven solutions


Expected learning: Hands-on experience with LLMs and their applications, Insights into educational technology and skills assessment, End-to-end project execution skills, from concept to deployment, Exposure to cutting-edge AI tools and frameworks


Specific courses required for project execution: Machine Learning or AI Fundamentals, Natural Language Processing, Python Programming with experience in web development


Title: Leveraging AI to Create Byte-Sized Content from Educational Resources


Description: This project focuses on developing an AI-powered system to generate concise, byte-sized content from lengthy educational resources like full-length lectures and PDFs. The aim is to make learning more efficient by summarizing and transforming information into easily digestible formats such as video snippets, infographics, and summaries.


Skill sets: Text summarization and content generation using AI, Python programming (NLP libraries like Hugging Face, Transformers), Speech-to-text and text-to-speech technologies, Video and multimedia processing


Traits expectation: Creative thinking to design user-friendly outputs, Ability to manage large-scale data

Attention to user experience and detail, Adaptability to explore and implement new tools


Expected learning: Practical experience in content generation using AI, Insights into multimedia processing and optimization, Understanding user-centric design for educational tools, Knowledge of summarization techniques and their real-world applications


Specific courses required for project execution: Natural Language Processing, Machine Learning,

Python Programming with a focus on Web Development
